sentences.en: Arrow Parry ( Level 15 ) - You can parry arrows from the air.
sentences.cn: 弓箭格挡 ( 要求等级15级 ) 你能挡住射来的弓箭.

sentences.en: Dodge and parry increased to 25 % for 10 seconds.
He could no longer parry the fierce attacks of the latter by simple avoidance.
sentences.cn: 他不能光是用逃避来抵挡后者的凶猛的攻击了.

sentences.en: He prefers to parry rather than duck and sway.
sentences.cn: 他喜欢闪避胜过弯腰和摇摆.

sentences.en: I did not want to wound him, but to restrict myself to defence, to parry his attacks.
sentences.cn: 我不想伤害他，只是想自我防卫，挡开他的攻击。

sentences.en: It is far easier to parry a direct blow than to stop it forcibly.
sentences.cn: 面对直接击打，挡开要比硬碰容易得多。

sentences.en: Mages and Priests no longer receive the Parry skill.
sentences.cn: 法师和牧师不再拥有武器格档技能了!

sentences.en: Martin Parry, author of the report, says it's time for concerted action by world leaders.
sentences.cn: 该报道的作者马丁·帕里宣称是世界各国的首脑采取一致行动的时候了。

sentences.en: Parry - Parry no longer provides 100 % avoidance and no longer speeds up attacks.
sentences.cn: 招架 - 招架将不会再提供100%减少伤害,不会再增加攻击速度.

sentences.en: Peripateticism is actually saponaceous subsistence philosophy and the parry to the monologue.
sentences.cn: 逍遥实则是一种圆滑的处世方式,是对“独白”的回避.

sentences.en: Rick Parry: Yes, we are very confident.
sentences.cn: 帕里: 有, 我们非常有信心.

sentences.en: Siege Engines should no longer block, parry or dodge.
sentences.cn: 攻城机械将不再格挡 、 招架和闪躲.

sentences.en: That with Deterrence is a 30 % chance of parry.
sentences.cn: 这和障碍同时使用就是30%的格档.

sentences.en: The parry is the main defensive skills, often followed by the counter - riposte.
sentences.cn: 挡、避是主要的防守技术, 通常防守中紧跟反还击.

sentences.en: The question was a quick, shrewd parry.
sentences.cn: 这句问话是一种穷急智生的狡猾的遁辞词.

sentences.en: We sought to parry the charateristic Soviet lunge with fancy footwork.
sentences.cn: 我们以花式步法力图避开典型的苏联冲刺.

trans.tran_en: to defend yourself against someone who is attacking you by pushing their weapon or hand to one side

trans.tran_cn: 挡开，避开，闪开（打击、武器）
